title: Felix Ipanaque Arevalo
text:
I am an entrepreneur who transitioned into a scientist to gain new ideas for my next startup.
Currently, I am pursuing my PhD in Neuroscience with a research focus on understanding the neural mechanisms underlying emotions in dreams.
I am using behavioral, computational, and neuroimaging methods to help people improve the quality of their sleep.
I collaborate with Dr. Abe Takashi in the Human Sleep Lab at the International Institute for Integrative Sleep Medicine (IIIS), University of Tsukuba in Ibaraki, Japan.
  My CV is available here.

title: Resources
text:
My favourite talks

David Deutsch: Chemical scum that dream of distant quasars. 
Ken Dill: The protein folding problem: A major conundrum of science. 
Lisa Feldman Barrett: You aren’t at mercy of your emotions – you create them. 
Mariana Mazzucato: Government – investor, risk-taker, innovator. 
Kay M. Tye: What investigating neural pathway can reveal about mental health

title: About Me
text:
Technological innovation fuels my passion. I am an Industrial & Systems engineer from Universidad de Piura in Peru, I hold a MBA from Universidad Los Andes in Colombia , Neuroscience PhD candidate at the Univeristy of Tsukuba in Japan, and tech entrepreneur. I am currently living in Tsukuba, Japan’s renowned science city, where I am actively developing my next business idea.
I envision a future where we share dream emotions just as easily as we share pictures and videos. This idea laid the groundwork for my Ph.D. Employing a neuroscience approach I link the brain activity of emotional experiences during wakefulness and dreaming states upon awakenings. Since dreams have a long history of being linked to emotional processing, they hold the potential to shape and influence human behavior, such as, adopt new habits, make better decisions or improve attention.
In 2014, I founded PickApp (now Scharff Express), a groundbreaking collaborative platform that used a social credit system to increase delivery guys’ digital reputation and make last-mile delivery more efficient for the logistics industry. In December 2017, PickApp was acquired by Scharff Inc. (FedEx Representative - Peru), hitting a milestone within the startup ecosystem in Peru. You can see the news here.
As an engineer, I have rolled out operational and manufacturing improvements across Mexico, Colombia, Peru, and Spain. I enjoy assisting businesses and entrepreneurs to get their projects off the ground using a lean startup mindset.

title: Events & Talks

Presentation on “How to kick-off your ideas?”

title: Events & Talks
text:
Appropiate Technology Demo Day - Japan 2018
Advisor, speaker and judge for the Demo Day of Appropiate Technology course. This course aims to give its students a holistic experience for developing a simple and low-cost technology for their target community. Appropiate Technology is conducted at The University of Tsukuba (Japan) under the School of Integrative and Global Majors.

title: Events & Talks
section: Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Forum. Port Moresby - 2018
text:
Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Forum. Port Moresby - 2018
I was invited to give a talk on the risks and opportunities of using big data in a digital economy.
APEC is a regional economic forum to promote foreign trade across Asia-Pacific country members.

title: Events & Talks
text:
StartUp Peru Summit 2017
I was invited to share my experiences on the Merge & Acquisition of PickApp by Scharff Inc.PickApp by Scharff Inc.
SUP Summit is the largest annual meeting of the peruvian startup ecosystem. It takes place in December 2017 and aims to foster collaborative work and open innovation among different stakeholders of the peruvian entrepreneurial ecosystem.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Intercon 2016
The International Conference on Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computing – INTERCON aims to bring together researchers, professionals, students and entrepreneurs to facilitate the approach, identification and commitment to join challenges that allow the development of technologies for the benefit of humanity. This event is organized by the IEEE Peru Section.
I was invited as a speaker to talk about my experience as a founder of PickApp, one of the very first startups in Peru.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Pacific Alliance - Mexico 2015
The Pacific Alliance is an initiative of regional integration across Chile, Colombia, Mexico and Peru. The trip was an initiative of the Peruvian startup community to find investors in Mexico.
